title: Keeping skins
body: https://image.prntscr.com/image/zlJlOmRSQ1iC_E33VN1hiA.png I would most likely to keep Lil devil teemo but i don't know what in support ticket i am suppose to put it in like what category

replies.body: Just let our team know which one you wanted to buy, and they can look into honoring that for you.  We'll see you in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
TICKET #31800457 well i sent a support ticket and i am still waiting for a reply.
